QuestData.Title: Heroes of the Horde!
QuestData.Description: Now to find their battle plans and take out their leaders! Should we succeed there is an orc high warlord who served in the war in Silverpine that is now stationed at Tarren Mill - located in the heart of Hillsbrad. He will grant both of us commendations for this! We will be heroes of the Horde, $n!$B$BOnward! Together we will defeat the Alliance filth!
QuestData.LogDescription: Steal the Alliance Battle Plans and Become Heroes of the Horde.
QuestData.RewardText: <High Warlord Cromush salutes.>$B$BHe will be honored as a hero of the Horde, just as he always hoped. What you and Orkus did will save hundreds of lives and ensure that our foothold in Hillsbrad is not lost.
